Detailed Description

template<class Ty>
class WeakPyPtr< Ty >

This template class is a weak reference to a Python object.

It distinuishes between a reference which is just NULL and a reference which to an object which has expired (or is not weakly referencable) TODO: should use callback instead of checking in good all the time. Note: you cannot have a reference to Py_None.
